item.title: Handling OVH's alerts with Apache Flink
item.description: This is a repost from OVH’s official blogpost.. Thanks Horacio Gonzalez for the awesome drawings! Handling OVH’s alerts with Apache Flink OVH relies extensively on metrics to effectively monitor its entire stack. Whether they are low-level or business centric, they allow teams to gain insight into how our services are operating on a daily basis. The need to store millions of datapoints per second has produced the need to create a dedicated team to build a operate a product to handle that load: **Metrics Data Platform.
